Cool if done right I think. But not when the CxO signs off on something (without consulting IT) for which you must now construct a use case.

In the middle of an <#1 cloud provider> IaaS deployment which you'd think be simple enough:

1) Build IPsec VPN to Provider
2) Build/Migrate desired servers
3) Consume services

Not so. I've spent more time than I'd care to admit troubleshooting VPN issues because the cloud provider is either unable to unwilling to provide logs to assist with troubleshooting. What would normally be a fairly quick process becomes exacerbated by lack of meaningful data to assist; it quickly devolves into a guessing game. Just my own experience anyway.
